name: Spring Time (AmDMaster)
description:
Hi guys,

This game was made in 20 hours since I was busy with school and just got free...

Try to make your own garden of your favorite combinations of flowers.

Use WASD to move and SPACE bar to pick a seed and Q to place it in the patches,

Do you think I should continue this project... Let me know in the comments.

Sorry guys couldn't make the music for this project too... I hope the next one I will.

Thank you for playing.
